inclusion.criterion: Fulfill diagnostic criteria of ankylosing spondylitis, 1984 New York
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients should previously have been included in the observational trial, "Clinical study of osteoporosis in ankylosing spondylitis"
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Patients should not have changed treatment with any biologics the past 4 months.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: BMD with a T-score ≤ -2,5 SD assessed by DXA in lumbar spine and/or hip (total hip and/or neck).
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients on glucocorticosteroids should not have changed the dose the last 4 months.
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: BMD with a T-score ≤ -2,0 SD assessed by DXA in lumbar spine and/or hip (total hip and/or neck) and presence of any vertebral fracture, hip fracture or peripheral fragility fracture.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: BMD with a T-score ≤ - 1,0 SD assessed by DXA in lumbar spine and/or hip (total hip and/or neck) in patients on oral glucocorticosteroids.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: The patient is a 60 year old man complaining of frequent headaches, generalized bone pain and difficulty chewing that started 6 years ago and is worsening.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Examination shows bilateral swellings around the molars. The swellings have increased since his last examination.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Several extraoral lesions are detected in the head and face.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: His serum alkaline phosphatase is 300 IU/L (the normal range is 44- 147 IU/L).
inclusion.label: met

notes: The patient has Paget's Disease of Bone and will be started on Bisphosphonate as first-line therapy.
